attributes.action: Scrap UK participation in the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How much money do we spend participating in the non-event 'old friends act' otherwise named as the Eurovision Song Contest? Everyone knows it's not a real contest and the music (if that's what you call it), is shocking. Lets do the right thing and get out now before it's too late. Put the money to better use and reclaim one wasted saturday night of TV a year!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
